MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G12 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.10am to repair an underground cable fault caused by third party damage outside 22 Ashburn Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.51am on the 15th Octo5er 2020.
